apps.name: Chatulus
apps.subtitle: Customizable messaging platform you can trust
apps.versionDescription: For full release details visit: https://chat.1us.ca/releases
apps.localizedDescription:
Chatulus - Customizable messaging platform you can trust 

Chatulus provides a user-customizable messaging client. It not only allows you to change how the Chatulus app looks, but it also allows users to choose between different encryption methods, and manage how their data are stored locally or in the cloud. You can even connect to your own server or any 3rd party server that you trust.
